entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 06:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
